RESOURCE.DESCRIPTION: Helio HEC time based query V1.16.25
RESOURCE.INFO: SELECT cme_forbush_event.HEC_id,cme_forbush_event.time_start,cme_forbush_event.flag_ssc,cme_forbush_event.fe_magn,cme_forbush_event.kpmax,cme_forbush_event.dst_min,cme_forbush_event.b_max,cme_forbush_event.vsw_max,cme_forbush_event.axy_min,cme_forbush_event.az_r,cme_forbush_event.tmin,cme_forbush_event.dc_min,cme_forbush_event.tdmn,cme_forbush_event.aftob,cme_forbush_event.tilt FROM cme_forbush_event WHERE time_start>='2003-02-01T00:00:00' AND time_start<='2003-02-10T00:00:00' LIMIT 100 OFFSET 0

FIELD.name: flag_ssc
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Flag indicating if the onset of the event corresponds ("sc") to a Storm Sudden Commencement, otherwise the flag is left blank.

FIELD.name: fe_magn
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Magnitude of 10 GV Cosmic Ray variation (in fact, magnitude of the FE)

FIELD.name: kpmax
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Maximum of the Kp-index in the associated geomagnetic deisturbance

FIELD.name: dst_min
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Minimum of the Dst-index in the associated geomagnetic disturbance

FIELD.name: b_max
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Maximum of the magnitude of the Interplanetary Magnetic Field in the associated solar wind disturbance

FIELD.name: vsw_max
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Maximum of the solar wind speed in the associated solar wind disturbance

FIELD.name: axy_min
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Maximum of the equatorial component of anisotropy during the Forbush Decrease.

FIELD.name: az_r
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Range of change for the north-south component of anisotropy during the Forbush Decrease

FIELD.name: tmin
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Time from onset to the Forbush Decrease minimum

FIELD.name: dc_min
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Maximum decrement between hourly counts of 10 GV Cosmic Rays

FIELD.name: tdmn
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Time from the onset to the maximum decrement in the 10 GV Cosmic Rays

FIELD.name: aftob
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Ratio of the variation in the 10 GV cosmic rays to the maximum of the IMF intensity in the associated solar wind distrubance (fe_magn/bimf_m)

FIELD.name: tilt
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Heliospheric current sheet tilt for day of the event
